description:
dotspott allows you to easily keep track of locations ("spotts") that are important to you. 

Your personal database of locations (and related metadata) can then be accessed to show you exactly where your spotts are & how to get to them. 

Features:
• See distance to spotts
• View larger version of spott photos
• Attach notes to your spotts
• Search your list of spotts
• Tag spotts to describe them
• Share spotts via email
• Attach photos to spotts
• Manage your spotts online at dotspott.com

For bug reports, feature requests, etc. to aautar@hotspotdot.net or tweet me @AvishkarAA

Note: GPS and Google Maps issues are independent of the this app. dotspott simply uses these services, I can't fix issues you may be having with them.

Note: dotspott has nothing to do with wi-fi hotspots... not sure why that confusion still exists.
versionNote:
Performance improvement
